ğŸš€Many new airports from around the globe have been added, but Denmark takes the spotlight this time with the inclusion of Aarhus, Aalborg, and Bornholm. All three can be tried out using the trial feature before purchasing. In addition, several other airports have been introduced, including ones perfect for bush trips. The scenery enhancement category also brings night lighting improvements and a new package that adds all Asian capitals as POIs to MSFS 2024.
